column1: 43930492$Magical Something$Unlimited$DARK$[Spellcaster/Effect]$$$$$4$1800$1300$$$$Each time a Spell Card is activated
column2: place 1 Spell Counter on this card when that Spell resolves. This card's Level is increased by the number of Spell Counters on it. You can remove 3 Spell Counters from this card
